response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $800,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unparalleled value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as the product is guaranteed to exceed your expectations and provide significant benefits. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
